attributes.action: Not allow fat cats to get extremely high bonuses when their company hasn't done well in the past year
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It really annoys me when companies have made record losses, made people redundant, failed to hit targets or been fined thousands or been bought out by another company that the fat cats get a very large bonus. Why should they get these bonuses when customers, former staff etc suffer?
